00061 LogManager::LogManager():m_inited(false), m_level(TREX_LOG_LEVEL) {
00062 }

00069 
00070 LogManager::path_type LogManager::locate(std::string const &file, bool &found) const {
00071   path_type ret(file);
00072   
00073   if( file.empty() )
00074     found = false;
00075   else {
00076     ret.make_preferred();
00077     
00078     found = is_regular_file(ret);
00079     
00080     if( !found && ret.is_relative() ) {
00081       path_iterator i = m_searchPath.begin();
00082       for(; m_searchPath.end()!=i; ++i ) {
00083         path loc(*i);
00084         loc /= ret; 
00085         path real_loc(loc);
00086         if( is_symlink(loc) )
00087           real_loc = read_symlink(loc);
00088         
00089         found = is_regular_file(real_loc);
00090        if( found )
00091          return loc;
00092       }
00093     }
00094   }
00095   return ret;
00096 }
00097 
00098 bool LogManager::addSearchPath(std::string const &path) {
00099   if( !path.empty() ) {
00100     path_type p(path);
00101     p.make_preferred();
00102     
00103     if( p.is_relative() || is_directory(p) ||
00104        ( is_symlink(p) && is_directory(read_symlink(p)) ) ) {
00105       m_searchPath.push_back(p);
00106       return true;
00107     }
00108   }
00109   return false;
00110 }
00111 
00112 void LogManager::loadSearchPath() {
00113   char *home = getenv(TREX_ENV);
00114   if( NULL!=home ) {
00115     std::string home_path(home);
00116     // Right now I am adding $TREX_HOME as it is
00117     // In  the future I may have to add $TREX_HOME/extra
00118     // -- or whatever I decide -- instead
00119     addSearchPath(home_path);
00120   }
00121   char *path = getenv(SEARCH_ENV);
00122   if( NULL!=path ) {
00123     // column separated list
00124     std::string path_str(path);
00125     static boost::char_delimiters_separator<char> sep(false, "", ":");
00126     boost::tokenizer<> tok(path_str, sep);
00127     for(boost::tokenizer<>::iterator beg=tok.begin(); beg!=tok.end();++beg) {
00128       addSearchPath(*beg);
00129     }
00130   }
00131 }
00132 
00133 LogManager::path_type const &LogManager::logPath() {
00134   SharedVar<bool>::scoped_lock lock(m_inited);
00135 
00136   if( !*m_inited ) {
00137     if( m_path.empty() ) {
00138       createLatest();
00139     } else if( !is_directory(m_path) ) { 
00140       create_directory(m_path);
00141     }
00142     path_type cfg(m_path), trex_log(m_path);
00143     cfg /= "cfg";
00144     create_directory(cfg);
00145     
00146     trex_log /= TREX_LOG_FILE;
00147     
00148     m_syslog.open(trex_log.c_str());
00149     m_syslog<<"TREX version "<<TREX::version::str();
00150     loadSearchPath();
00151     *m_inited = true;
00152   }
00153   return m_path;
00154 }
00155 
00156 void LogManager::createLatest() {
00157   char *base_dir_name = getenv(LOG_DIR_ENV);
00158   char dated_dir[16];
00159   
00160   if( NULL==base_dir_name ) {
00161     throw ErrnoExcept("LogManager: $"LOG_DIR_ENV" is not set");
00162   }
00163   path_type base_dir(base_dir_name);
00164   base_dir.make_preferred();
00165   
00166   // compute the base name using YYYY.jjj format
00167   dated_dir[15] = '\0';
00168   time_t cur_time;
00169   time(&cur_time);
00170   strftime(dated_dir, 15, "%Y.%j", gmtime(&cur_time));
00171   std::string dir_base(dated_dir);
00172   
00173   path_type latest(base_dir);
00174   size_t last = 0;
00175   
00176   latest /= LATEST_DIR;
00177   if( exists(latest) ) {
00178     // I assume that lates is a symlink
00179     path_type real = read_symlink(latest).filename();
00180     if( real.stem().string()==dir_base ) {
00181       std::istringstream iss(std::string(real.extension().string(), 1));
00182       iss>>last;
00183     }
00184     remove(latest);
00185   }
00186   for(unsigned i=1; i<MAX_LOG_ATTEMPT; ++i) {
00187     std::ostringstream oss;
00188     m_path = base_dir;
00189     oss<<dir_base<<'.'<<std::setw(2)<<std::setfill('0')<<(last+i);
00190     
00191     m_path /= oss.str();
00192     if( !exists(m_path) ) {
00193       create_directory(m_path);
00194       create_directory_symlink(m_path, latest);
00195       return;
00196     }
00197   }
00198   throw ErrnoExcept("LogManager", "Too many attempts ... clean up your "
00199                   "log directory");
00200 }
00201 
00202 LogManager::path_type LogManager::file_name(std::string const &short_name) {
00203   path_type ret(logPath());
00204   ret /= short_name;
00205   ret.make_preferred();
00206   return ret;
00207 }
00208 
00209 LogManager::path_type LogManager::getCfgPath() {
00210   return file_name("cfg");
00211 }
00212 
00213 std::string LogManager::use(std::string const &file_name, bool &found) {
00214   path_type located = locate(file_name, found);
00215   if( found ) {
00216     path_type dest(getCfgPath()), tmp(file_name), src(located);
00217     if( tmp.is_relative() ) 
00218       dest /= tmp;
00219     else dest /= src.filename();
00220     
00221     syslog()<<"- Using file "<<located;
00222     if( exists(dest) )
00223       syslog("WARN")<<"A file with this name already exists in the cfg log."
00224                     <<"\n\tI won't overwrite the previous file.";
00225     else {
00226       if( is_symlink(located) ) 
00227         src = read_symlink(located);
00228       create_directories(dest.parent_path());
00229       copy(src, dest);
00230     }
00231   }
00232   return located.string();
00233 }
00234 
00235 TextLog &LogManager::syslog() {
00236   return m_syslog;
00237 }
00238 
00239 internals::LogEntry LogManager::syslog(std::string const &txt) {
00240   return m_syslog<<('['+txt+"] ");
00241 }
00242 
00243 bool LogManager::setLogLevel(LogLevel lvl) {
00244   SharedVar<bool>::scoped_lock guard(m_inited);
00245   if( !*m_inited ) {
00246     m_level = lvl;
00247     return true;
00248   }
00249   syslog("LogManager")<<"Cannot change verbosity level after init."<<std::endl;
00250   return false;
00251 }
00252 
00253 bool LogManager::setLogPath(std::string const &path) {
00254   SharedVar<bool>::scoped_lock guard(m_inited);
00255   if( !*m_inited ) {
00256     m_path = path;
00257     return true;
00258   }
00259   syslog("LogManager")<<"Cannot change log path after init."<<std::endl;
00260   return false;
00261 }
